column4: When I get an updated app, why do the libs etc also have to upgraded? Particularly when the app doesn't need the updated libs...I guess, I'm asking how make the updated lib a dependent?
sure, but does that do Wine as well?
you don't   Konqueror uses KHTML,  Webkit is based on KHTML
Epiphany will use Gecko by default, but it can use Webkit instead by the way
